recipesJson.name: Betsy
recipesJson.author: coop34
recipesJson.description: This is my son-in-law's attempt at a popular commercial juice. Close enough. Besides that, I like simple recipes that manage to taste like more than they are.

reviews.text: This is a lovely juicy flavour, I added .5 sweet for my sweet tooth and really enjoying it.
Very good! Added a little super sweet to my mix, it's delicious.
Add a shitload of sweetener to get it even closer to the original.
Have to give it five stars, "simple" two flavor mix yet it tastes more complex, delicious and smooth, can't put it down.
